name: Pokémon Solar Light & Lunar Dark
summary: Pokémon Solar Light & Lunar Dark is a free fangame made in RPG Maker XP and Pokémon Essentials. The game takes place in the Rikoto region, where the player must collect 8 Gym Badges in order to compete in the Rikoto Regional Championship. Along the way, the player must also fill up their Pokédex with the entries of more than 350 different species of Pokémon.
